    • Method Detail

      • getJDBCAC

        public static JDBConnectionActivityCategory getJDBCAC()

      • addSuggestionActivityCategory

        public void addSuggestionActivityCategory(java.lang.String title,
                                          java.lang.String description)
        This method is used when a simple user wants to suggest an activity category. It creates the suggestion into the database. The goal title argument specifies the goal and must be a String.

        Parameters:
        goal - title (a String giving the title of the goal), goal description (a String giving the description of the goal),
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getAllActivityCategories

        public java.util.ArrayList<ActivityCategory> getAllActivityCategories()
        This method is used when a simple user wants to get all activity categories. It gets the activity categories from the database.

        Returns:
        ArrayList of Activity Categories
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getAllSuggestionActivityCategory

        public java.util.ArrayList<ActivityCategory> getAllSuggestionActivityCategory()
        This method is used when an admin wants to get all the suggestions about activity categories. It gets the suggestions from the database.

        Returns:
        ArrayList of Activity Categories
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getLastActivityCategorySuggestion

        public ActivityCategory getLastActivityCategorySuggestion()
        This method is only used for JUnit tests. It gets the last Activity Category Suggestion from the database.

        Returns:
        ActivityCategory
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
